name: Snow Fighter (hindba)
description:
This game was developed as a part of COURSERA game development course. 

Modification to this game: 

1- the overall game theme was changed to represent snow planet

2- A third level was added to the game that has many interesting exploring points and spawning enemies (the rate of spawning was modified to increase the difficulty).

3- rest points was added to the game which has check points and variety of pickups

4- the particles of the pistol gun were changed to represent snow effect

5- the player now can search for door key inside buildings and fight his way through

6-  A help page was added to the to guide the player of game controls 

7- a text is displayed to notify the user when it reaches closed gate that he needs to find the key

8- the music has been modified to match the game theme

Credits: Hind Baageel
